description: Create PRD for user profile editing feature

context.feature_request: Add ability for users to edit their profile information including name, email, avatar, and bio. Users should be able to update their information through a dedicated profile settings page.
context.target_users: End users of the web application (both free and premium accounts)
context.existing_system: We have a user authentication system with JWT tokens, user database in PostgreSQL, and a basic profile display page
context.business_goals: Improve user engagement by allowing personalization, reduce support tickets about profile updates

constraints.technical_stack: React frontend, Node.js backend, PostgreSQL database
constraints.security_requirements: Must validate all inputs, require re-authentication for email changes
